mapper.select:
select t1.id,t1.buMenMingCheng,t1.buMenJianJie,t1.dangAnId,t1.chuangJianShiJian, t2.xingMing,t2.biYeYuanXiao from oadb.bumen as t1 ,oadb.renyuandangan as t2 where t1.dangAnId = t2.id
and t1.buMenMingCheng like #{buMenMingCheng}
mapper.insert: insert into bumen buMenMingCheng, buMenJianJie, dangAnId; chuangJianShiJian value ( #{buMenMingCheng}, #{buMenJianJie}, #{dangAnId}, #{chuangJianShiJian}, );
mapper.update: update bumen set buMenMingCheng=#{buMenMingCheng}, buMenJianJie=#{buMenJianJie}, dangAnId=#{dangAnId}, chuangJianShiJian=#{chuangJianShiJian}
